title: Issue a Lease Violation Notice
description: A routine inspection revealed an unauthorized pet in a tenant's unit. The agent must issue a formal notice to cure or quit.

tasks.description: Confirm the 'no pets' clause in the tenant's signed lease agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the lease terms prohibit pets.

tasks.description: Generate a formal 'Notice to Cure or Quit' citing the specific lease violation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the correct legal notice with all required details.

tasks.description: Deliver the notice to the tenant as required by law and document the delivery.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows legal requirements for notice delivery and logs the action.
